Author: riseaboveitx
Text: I’ve had three separate relationships where this was an issue. None of them liked that I would lose and seen more attractive to others, especially with them repeatedly telling me I looked better before or at a certain weight, etc. They all also used the metaphor that it felt like I was cheating on them and trying to hurt them by always choosing my illness/vanity over them after it was established that I wasn’t talking to or seeing other guys. Sucks and is ironic because when I think of moving in with a partner in the future my first thought is how I’ll be able to hide everything.
